body: Need to create a user-friendly website with all the usability testing advantages? Contact one of our specialists on [Cavaon](https://cavaon.com) to create the perfect website.
subtitle: Is there a better way to find out their preferences?
title: Usability testing: Find Out How Your Users Navigate Through Your Website
description: Usability test is observation of a user performing a certain task within the product or service that will be evaluated. Researchers will watch, listen and take note of all user actions. Itâ€™s a different technique of qualitative research that gives insight into your product and user experience (UX).
